title: Jermaine Dupri Interview and More
itunes:title: Jermaine Dupri Interview and More
description:
Thursday 4/6- Today on the show Jermaine Dupri and the contestants from his show "Rap Game" joined us to speak about rap and the SoSo Summer 2017 Tour coming up. Also, since Angela Yee is on vacation Charlamagne and Dj Envy took over with Ask C and E. Also, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to Timothy Lee Marbles.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Thursday 4/6- Today on the show Jermaine Dupri and the contestants from his show "Rap Game" joined us to speak about rap and the SoSo Summer 2017 Tour coming up. Also, since Angela Yee is on vacation Charlamagne and Dj Envy took over with Ask C and E. Also, Charlamagne gave Donkey of the Day to Timothy Lee Marbles.
